Create a Continuous schedule

1 In the Clinical Content folder, double-click Schedules.

2 Click New.

3 In the Description box, enter the schedule name.

4 In the Frequency box, enter -1.

5 In the Duration box, enter a length of time in hours.

This parameter determines how long an order with this schedule remains active on a flowsheet as indicated by starting and ending points. Documentation must start between the two points. Once started, items remain active until stopped by a caregiver.

6 Click Save.

7 When you are finished creating schedules, click Close.
